amendatorysection.para: The members shall select the board as it is composed prior to January 1, 2001, except the representative of the general public and the representative of the health agency who shall be appointed by the director. The director shall select the board as it is composed on and after January 1, 2001. The board shall select one or more insurers to serve as administering insurer pursuant to section 44-4223. The selection of the board as it is composed prior to January 1, 2001, and the selection of the administering insurer by the board prior to January 1, 2001, or after December 31, 2000, shall be subject to the approval of the director.
